text: The Municipality of Radovljica (; ) is a municipality in the Upper Carniola region of northern Slovenia. The capital of the municipality is the town of Radovljica.Radovljica municipal site (Slovene) The municipality has around 18,000 inhabitants and an area of . It is located at the southern slope of the Karawanks mountain range at the confluence of the Sava Dolinka and the Sava Bohinjka, both headwaters of the Sava River. == References == == Other websites == * * Municipality of Radovljica on Geopedia * Radovljica municipal site Category:Municipalities of Slovenia
title: Municipality of Radovljica
